titles.title: A bill to require the FCC to conduct an economic study on the impact that low-power FM stations will have on full-power commercial FM stations.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13701)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
11/1/2007--Introduced.
Requires the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) to conduct an economic study on the impact that low-power FM stations will have on full-power commercial FM stations and report to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation of the Senate and the Committee on Energy and Commerce of the House of Representatives.
